title: Lieutenant General Brent Scowcroft • The Bush School of Government & Public Service

organizations.name: The Forum for International Policy
quotes: He was the founder and President of The Forum for International Policy, a non-partisan, non-profit organization providing independent analyses and perspectives on major foreign policy issues.

organizations.name: The Scowcroft Group, Inc.
quotes: He was also President of The Scowcroft Group, Inc., an international business advisory firm.

organizations.name: Kissinger Associates, Inc.
quotes: Prior to joining the Bush Administration, General Scowcroft was Vice Chairman of Kissinger Associates, Inc.

organizations.name: Organization of the Joint Chiefs of Staff
quotes: In the course of his military career, General Scowcroft held positions in the Organization of the Joint Chiefs of Staff; Headquarters of the U.S. Air Force; and the Office of the Assistant Secretary of Defense for International Security Affairs.

organizations.name: U.S. Air Force
quotes: In the course of his military career, General Scowcroft held positions in the Organization of the Joint Chiefs of Staff; Headquarters of the U.S. Air Force; and the Office of the Assistant Secretary of Defense for International Security Affairs.

organizations.name: Office of the Assistant Secretary of Defense for International Security Affairs
quotes: In the course of his military career, General Scowcroft held positions in the Organization of the Joint Chiefs of Staff; Headquarters of the U.S. Air Force; and the Office of the Assistant Secretary of Defense for International Security Affairs.

organizations.name: U.S. Air Force Academy
quotes: Other assignments included faculty positions at the U. S. Air Force Academy and the U.S. Military Academy at West Point, and Assistant Air Attaché at the American Embassy in Belgrade, Yugoslavia.

organizations.name: U.S. Military Academy at West Point
quotes: Other assignments included faculty positions at the U. S. Air Force Academy and the U.S. Military Academy at West Point, and Assistant Air Attaché at the American Embassy in Belgrade, Yugoslavia.

organizations.name: Qualcomm Corporation
quotes: General Scowcroft served as a Director of the Qualcomm Corporation and on the University of California President’s Council on the National Laboratories.

organizations.name: University of California President’s Council on the National Laboratories
quotes: General Scowcroft served as a Director of the Qualcomm Corporation and on the University of California President’s Council on the National Laboratories.

organizations.name: American-Turkish Council
quotes: He served as chairman of the American-Turkish Council, president of the George Bush Presidential Library Foundation and was chairman of the Atlantic Council.

organizations.name: George Bush Presidential Library Foundation
quotes: He served as chairman of the American-Turkish Council, president of the George Bush Presidential Library Foundation and was chairman of the Atlantic Council.

organizations.name: Atlantic Council
quotes: He served as chairman of the American-Turkish Council, president of the George Bush Presidential Library Foundation and was chairman of the Atlantic Council.

organizations.name: Gerald R. Ford Foundation
quotes: He was also a member of the board of the Gerald R. Ford Foundation, the George C. Marshall Foundation, the Center for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS), the International Republican Institute, the National Defense University, and the American Council on Germany.

organizations.name: George C. Marshall Foundation
quotes: He was also a member of the board of the Gerald R. Ford Foundation, the George C. Marshall Foundation, the Center for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS), the International Republican Institute, the National Defense University, and the American Council on Germany.

organizations.name: Center for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS)
quotes: He was also a member of the board of the Gerald R. Ford Foundation, the George C. Marshall Foundation, the Center for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS), the International Republican Institute, the National Defense University, and the American Council on Germany.

organizations.name: International Republican Institute
quotes: He was also a member of the board of the Gerald R. Ford Foundation, the George C. Marshall Foundation, the Center for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS), the International Republican Institute, the National Defense University, and the American Council on Germany.

organizations.name: National Defense University
quotes: He was also a member of the board of the Gerald R. Ford Foundation, the George C. Marshall Foundation, the Center for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS), the International Republican Institute, the National Defense University, and the American Council on Germany.

organizations.name: American Council on Germany
quotes: He was also a member of the board of the Gerald R. Ford Foundation, the George C. Marshall Foundation, the Center for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS), the International Republican Institute, the National Defense University, and the American Council on Germany.

organizations.name: Columbia University’s School of International and Public Affairs
quotes: He also served on the Advisory Board of Columbia University’s School of International and Public Affairs.

organizations.name: President’s Foreign Intelligence Advisory Board
quotes: General Scowcroft chaired or served on a number of policy advisory councils, including the President’s Foreign Intelligence Advisory Board; the United Nations Secretary-General’s High-Level Panel on Threats, Challenges and Change; the Eisenhower Institute; the President’s General Advisory Committee on Arms Control; the President’s Commission on Strategic Forces; the President’s Blue Ribbon Commission on Defense Management;

organizations.name: United Nations Secretary-General’s High-Level Panel on Threats, Challenges and Change
quotes: General Scowcroft chaired or served on a number of policy advisory councils, including the President’s Foreign Intelligence Advisory Board; the United Nations Secretary-General’s High-Level Panel on Threats, Challenges and Change; the Eisenhower Institute; the President’s General Advisory Committee on Arms Control; the President’s Commission on Strategic Forces; the President’s Blue Ribbon Commission on Defense Management;

roles.title: founder and President
quotes: He was the founder and President of The Forum for International Policy, a non-partisan, non-profit organization providing independent analyses and perspectives on major foreign policy issues.

roles.title: President

roles.title: Vice Chairman

roles.title: Assistant to the President for National Security Affairs
quotes: General Scowcroft served as Assistant to the President for National Security Affairs to Presidents Gerald Ford and George H. W. Bush.

roles.title: Military Assistant to President Nixon
quotes: He also served as Military Assistant to President Nixon and as Deputy Assistant to the President for National Security Affairs to Presidents Ford and Nixon.

roles.title: Deputy Assistant to the President for National Security Affairs
quotes: He also served as Military Assistant to President Nixon and as Deputy Assistant to the President for National Security Affairs to Presidents Ford and Nixon.
